about.backgroundText: I'm Ethan Carollo, a {word} developer and a Master's student in Interactive Dev at Annecy Gobelins. I work with a variety of languages, including Kotlin for Android and Python for machine learning. I also love Nuxt and spend my free time developing games with Unity.
